overview:
Christine Frank is a Managing Director at Waller Capital Partners. Her primary focus is to provide merger, acquisition, strategic and financial advisory services to the information services and technology sector. This includes advising companies that offer B2B information and data services, application software, internet services, digital content management, and advertising technology. Christine currently serves on the advisory boards of C3 Metrics and Songdish.com.

Throughout her 20 year career in investment banking, Christine has advised companies in the technology, media and telecom sectors and their private equity investors, helping close $26 billion in mergers and acquisitions transactions. Christine has raised $20 billion in capital for her clients through public and private equity and debt financings. Christine was previously a senior banker at Compass Advisers, an internationally focused M&A firm. She has also held senior investment banking positions covering TMT companies and their private equity sponsors at Bear Stearns, Banc of America Securities, BMO Capital Markets and CIT. Christine began her career at Chase Manhattan Bank and at Fox Broadcasting Company.

Christine has an M.B.A. in Finance from Columbia Business School and a B.A. in Communications from UCLA, where she graduated magna cum laude. She holds the Series 7, 63 and 79 FINRA licenses.
